tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StudentProgress (
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    quiz_score INT,
    assignment_score INT,
    exam_score INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (student_id)
)

CREATE TABLE student_progress (
    student_id INT,
    quiz_id INT,
    assignment_id INT,
    exam_id INT,
    progress_date DATE,
    overall_progress FLOAT
);
